title: COVID-19: The System
occurrences: to COVID-19?
When people talk about COVID-19 it's positioned more or less as an enemy.
Looking at how we're built, in terms of our immune system...
But there's much more. The immune system is wide-ranging.
There are various different aspects of the immune system you have to look at.
In the system. -In the system. In the business model.
I have a question about COVID-19.
We've seen that COVID-19 causes a reaction...
I have a question for you as a journalist. What I've noticed since COVID-19...
What's your experience of that as a journalist in the COVID-19 period?
As long as we have this financial system...
The basis of this system, as I said, is that tax is paid for the people.
It is maintained based on the fact that we have a system...
But not within this system. -Then how, Ad? What's your view?
We need to get rid of this system. This financial system took shape...
It was set up as a system to make money available...
We need to get out of this system and move to a different one.
Because the system we're in now is simply not good for us.
It's a destructive financial system.
So we need a new system and we need to move to a new social structure.
The Italian benefit system isn't as well developed...
In this case we had the virus, of course: COVID-19.
